short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The best cashback deals at your favourite stores.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"OODLZ helps you secure the most Cashback available from over 10,000 stores worldwide.

Our job is to get you the highest cashback available on all your purchases.

All you have to do is head to your favourite store online via the oodlz browser extension, app or website to secure your cashback. 

Sign up for FREE and start saving today!

CASHBACK ON EVERYTHING YOU LOVE TO SHOP FOR

Shop Fashion & Beauty, Restaurants & Food, Travel & Holidays, Luxury Brands, Phones & Electronics, Home & Lifestyle, Baby & Child, Energy, Gas, Insurance and more. Be rewarded wherever your shop!

HERE’S HOW IT WORKS

When you shop at your favourite stores through oodlz, we earn a commission from those retailers and share almost all (up to 90%) of it with you.

1 – Simply join for free

Maximise your cash back by downloading the browser notifier.

2 – Shop online

Find your favourite stores on our website or app and click 'shop now' to shop as usual.

3 – Get cash back

Easily withdraw your cash into your PayPal or bank account.

That’s it!

But wait, there’s more…

REWARDS YOU CONTROL

Log in to your oodlz account, view your balance and withdraw your cash at any time.

BANK-LEVEL SECURITY

We’ve partnered with financial service providers who ensure your data is hardware encrypted and inaccessible to others.

GET THE APP FREE

Cashback on the go – simply download the oodlz app free to unlock smart shopping deals and offers, manage your account and discover rewards near you.

HAVE QUESTIONS? ASK US!

We're always excited to hear from you! If you have any feedback, or questions please email us at hello@oodlz.io.

By installing this extension, you agree to the oodlz.io terms (https://www.oodlz.io/terms-conditions/) and privacy policy (https://www.oodlz.io/privacy-policy/)

The oodlz extension uses Google Analytics to collect usage statistics to improve user experience. You can opt-out of Google Analytics tracking by visiting http://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout."
